snippet: b Mariano García Remón and Vanderlei Luxemburgo share a victory against Real Sociedad in the La Liga. The match was suspended due to a bomb threat on 12 December 2004, with seven minutes remaining and the score at 1–1.

title: Real Madrid CF - Wikipedia
snippet: In the early 1990s, La Quinta del Buitre split up after Martín Vázquez, Emilio Butragueño and Míchel left the club. In 1996, President Lorenzo Sanz appointed Fabio Capello as coach.
